name: schlo checkers
description:
A dialogue-heavy, interactive experience involving a fictional board game: schlo checkers.

Schlos are a group of genetically engineered humans.

In this simulation, a well-known figure in Schlo culture, Drey Gan, is selected to participate in a series of schlo checkers games against a variety of friends and foes, most of which have been featured in previous schlo works. The player, you, can select who Drey chooses to play against and what moves he makes. The simulation allows you to press different buttons to make different situations happen, but it's not exactly like you'll be playing the game.

This project isn't directly in relation to any prior schlo works, but is still in accordance with events that have taken place previously.
